tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Me and my husband were going through a low phase in our life when our infertility treatment was not successful. We were heart broken and lost all hope.

*** **** * **** ** **** ***** **** ******** ** ********* **** ****** *** **** *********** *********** We thought of giving it at a last try and booked an appointment with Dr. Roya Rozati. She owns the hospital and is considered to be one of the best infertility treatment specialists in Hyderabad.

She carefully listened to all our problems, including how we went through an infertility treatment before and did not find any success with it. Dr. Roya Rozati was supportive and caring and she asked her to go through her treatment. She assured us of getting successful results.

We were a bit hesitant at first but then we listened to her. After almost 1 year, I am a mother of a 3 month old baby. **** *** ********* *** ****** *********** *********** Dr. Roya Rozati was able to help me conceive. I am not only grateful to her but also her entire team of doctors, nurse, medical staffs and lab technicians were excellent at their job.

I will suggest every couple who had an unsuccessful infertility treatment or wants to treat their infertility should get in touch with Dr. Roya Rozati as she will provide them the **** treatment and assist them in achieving a successful pregnancy.
Doctor screams, receptionist not know t behave with patients, the receptionist does not how to write name. Please don't visit her...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
She is a very friendly doctor with a lot of experience in fertility treatments in Hyderabad. I found her through a friend who got treated by her after 10 years of complicated  pregnancy.  Her guidance helped me a lot in overcoming most tough phase of my life. 

Her hands are truly blessed.
Doctor gave me medicines for cure whereas other doctors were suggesting surgery.I am surprised and hope to recover soon.Thanks madam.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: The only problem is I wated for 2 hours 30 min and then got to see a Dr...she is an awesome Dr worth waiting for her nice she is...very good doctor.

Sat there and waited an hour ***** *** ****** *** ** * ******** ***** **** ****** I was 15mins ahead of the appointment. finally I left frustrated and had to literally run out if the staff who was more desperate to keep the registration fee than actually reach the doctor to tell me when she would be available.Good or great as a doctor,  definitely seems to have become more important than the need to care for patients. I'm not going to go back to the make shift hole

context: family planning and full contraceptive services,
review: **** *** ***********  Dr should be friendly and understanding. Maybe i got wrong impression. She is a good doctor but i will not go there again.
As per staff doc time is 5pm but on Practo appointment slots were gien for 4 and 4:30 pm. Not worth.

The way she give treatment is amazing and she uneerstand the patient condition And suggest treatment as per the requirement 
Really satisfy with her treatment
